snippet.title: Blade Runner 2049 Will Be Missing One Much-Hated Element From The Original
snippet.content:
Joe Mangianello is very close-lipped about The Batman. Some Marvel concept has been revealed to the world at large. And news about when Misha Collins will return to Supernatural. Spoilers ahead!
Image: Warner Bros.
Blade Runner 2049
In an interview with , Denis Villeneuve confirmed there will be no narration in the film.
Tucker and Dale vs. Evil 2
During a roundtable interview at San Diego Comic-Con, Alan Tudyk and Tyler Labine revealed the reason the sequel's been put on hold - mainly, the script just wasn't very good.
[]
The Batman
Joe Mangianello refused to talk about Deathstroke when asked if he had any information on the character appearing in Matt Reeves version of the film.
Justice League
As it happens, the film's official fan page shared an image of Batman's updated cowl on .
Han Solo
Emilia Clarke shared a video of herself monkeying around with Chewbacca on Instagram.
It
After a set visit, can confirm Pennywise does not transform into a giant spider at any point in the film - though he does shapeshift into a scabrous leper portrayed by actor Javier Botet for a scene. the Turtle, a key figure in the Dark Tower mythos, also does not appear, but an Easter egg alludes to his presence.
Avengers: Infinity War
Josh Brolin has headed back to the set for more Thanos-related reshoots.
Captain Marvel
Concept art of the Skrulls revealed at San Diego Comic Con has surfaced online.
Supernatural
Jensen Ackles revealed at San Diego Comic-Con that Misha Collins is returning:
Future Man
Set Rogen spoke to about his upcoming time travel series for Hulu.
Gotham
Gotham returns to television in the US September 21 as the lead-in to Seth McFarlane's sci-fi series, The Orville, according to .
The Defenders
During a round table interview at San Diego Comic Con, Sigourney Weaver stated she sees her character Alexandra as a "heroine".
[]
The Gifted
Stan Lee stopped by the set for a photo with the cast.
Supergirl
David Harewood revealed to the new season begins just "minutes" after the end of season two.
Arrow
Episode 6x03 is titled "Next of Kin", according to .
In related news, Katie Cassidy stated in an interview with that season six will explore Black Siren's relationship with the deceased Oliver Queen of Earth-2.
The Flash
Episodes 4x02 and 4x03 are titled, "Mixed Signals" and "Luck Be a Lady", respectively.
[]
The 100
The season five premiere is titled, "Eden".
[]
Preacher
Here's an interview with the cast where Dominic Cooper reveals "without realising, we've already met" the show's version of God - and that "something is revealed at the end [of the season] that is so dramatically important, it reveals... the reason behind everything."
Rick and Morty
To celebrate the new season, more Rick & Morty-related antics have been posted to YouTube - including a Ghostbusters parody, a new short, and an interview with storyboard artist Erica Hayes.
Finally, here's the live streamed aftershow trailing yesterday's premiere episode.
Banner art by Jim Cooke.
WATCH MORE: Entertainment News
